name: Untethered (apricotjam)
description:
Life in space is cold, dark and scary. Fortunately it won't last long.

Float your way though an infinite maze of asteroids, gathering resources to survive.

Made for the first libGDX gamejam.

Controls

The game is controlled solely with the mouse, click away!
